# Eavesdropping


- Two tasks $T_{A}, T_{B}$ , share feature F
	- F is harder to learn in one task
	- One task can eavesdrop into another ([Hard Parameter Sharing] , [Soft Parameter Sharing](Hard Parameter Sharing] , [Soft Parameter Sharing.qmd))
	- Extra info in each task
